title: Welcome
slogan: Create your own flexible Sensor Network
username-placeholder: Enter username or email or phone
username-helper-text: Please input your credential in the System
password-helper-text: The minimum length of the password is 6
phone-format-text: Follow the format +(country-code) xxx xx xx
terms-conditions-text: I have read and understood the Terms and Conditions of
invalid-password-field-text: The password must have at least 6 symbols
invalid-password-field-confirmation-text: The confirmation must match the password
why-collecting-phone-text: We collect phone because for some reasons, some users forget their credentials. Using the phone number we can address a unique ID in the System to each user

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.
